text.div:
Claim HHA Referral Code

Effective with Version 'I', the code used to identify the means by which the beneficiary was referred for Home Health services. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmhharfrl_cd

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/clm-hha-rfrl-cd

name: Claim HHA Referral Code
description: Effective with Version 'I', the code used to identify the means by which the beneficiary was referred for Home Health services. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_hha_rfrl_cd
